DOC.brief_summary: This study determine clinical minimum residual disease ( MRD ) response combination ibrutinib plus venetoclax subject treatment-naive chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) /small lymphocytic lymphoma
DOC.brief_title: Ibrutinib Plus Venetoclax Patients With Treatment-naive Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia /Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis CLL/SLL meet IWCLL diagnostic criterion ( Hallek 2008 ) , active disease meeting least 1 IWCLL criterion require treatment . Measurable nodal disease compute tomography ( CT ) Adequate hepatic , renal function Adequate hematologic function absolute neutrophil count > 750/µL platelet count > 30,000 /μL hemoglobin > 8.0 g/dL Any prior therapy use treatment CLL/SLL Known allergy xanthine oxidase inhibitor and/or rasburicase subject risk TLS
